channel.title: Fishme 667

item.title: Fishme 667
item.dc:creator: @jacobr jacobr
item.description:
@jacobr wrote:

My friend discovered a new command on my rsps the other day “::fishme” and he decided to be adventurous and use it so all the npcs disappeared and I had to restart the server (which pissed quite a few people off) and then when we got back online one of the players went to a shop and couldn’t use it and then we realised very few of the shops actually worked… I have been trying for days to fix it even resorting to roll back but everything I have tried fails so I’ve come here to see if anyone can help me with the problem.

Here is the command:

		if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("fishme")) {
			for (NPC n : World.getNPCs()) {
				World.removeNPC(n);
				n.reset();
				n.finish();
			}
			for (int i = 0; i < 18000; i++)
				NPCSpawns.loadNPCSpawns(i);
			return true;
		}

Any help is much appreciated
Thanks,
Jacobr
